jobDescription: Sr./Data Privacy AnalystThe Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco is looking for a Sr./Data Privacy Analyst to join our Information Security Operations Team. The Federal Reserve has a global mission and offers leading edge work in a stable environment with competitive pay, superior benefits AND a true “work life balance”. If you desire to be part of a world-class team and to develop your skills and experience beyond anything available in the commercial sector, the Federal Reserve is the place for you.In this role, you will support the Banks’ Privacy Program. You will determine what data can be shared, assure compliance, quantify IT security risks and support remediation activities. You will contribute to devising strategy, driving projects and identifying initiatives related to the collection and use of personal data. You will support the inventory of privacy-related data; assessment of privacy-risks; and monitoring for privacy compliance. You will also participate in driving state of the art privacy policies, coordinate privacy training, engage and advise business areas on the collection, use and retention of personal data, review local privacy procedures, review vendor contracts, assist with data privacy incident response activities, address international privacy issues, and collaborate with other areas of the Bank, such as information security, legal, and human resources.Essential Responsibilities:•Works with customers to identify security requirements, using methods that may include risk and business impact assessments•Gathers security information within the various stages of the system development process•Periodically validates and verifies security controls are working as designed•Works with staff from
